name: Spheres (JaseOwens)
description:
Spheres is a prototype for a Real Time Strategy game, made for the 13th GM(48). Which is a 48 hour game jam. The theme of this jam was: Death is Useful. For more information on the GM(48) click here.

Spheres is a RTS game with strange looking spaceships, and even stranger looking bases. Control up to 100 individual units, and use them to destroy the enemies base before they destroy yours. But in Spheres when your units die, they are replaced with two smaller, and less healthy versions. Use these tiny ships to your advantage to crush the rudimentary AI.
